title: The C Programming Language
author: Kernighan & Ritchie
synopsis: The seminal work on C written by the authors of the language. It introduces the language through small exercises and examples.
review: Historically, A++. Currently, B-. There are more effective books for those who read. And everyone else can watch Youtube.
videoTitle: The C Programming Language by Kernighan and Ritchie - Unboxing / brief discussion about the contents
